resources.string: I am an Android Developer based in Lagos Nigeria. I\'m passionate about creating a user friendly application that will be able to solve problems we face in our daily lives. My primary goal is to use my great critical thinking skills to develop easier and faster ways of performing daily human activities.
I have overall 1 year experience in using Kotlin to build user friendly and interactive android applications

BabbanGona
Mobile Intern 
February 2022- Present
Part of the software developers responsible for building applications to track the work and progress of the farmers in the farm.
Part of the software developers responsible for building applications to track the work and progress of the farmers in the farm.
I am interested in joining a team where I will be able to learn together and work with people who are also willing to learn and share knowledge with the common goal of learning.
Reasons why you need me on your team:
● I\'m a good communicator and this will be useful when we have to collaborate to come up with ideas as a team.
● My knowledge of kotlin will be useful when working on projects. I have also taken courses which I feel will be useful to the team.
● My readiness to work in order to ensure we complete tasks
● I\'m a great team player. I have worked with teams and will not find it hard to do so in the course of this internship
● I do not like to quit which will be useful in situations where tasks we will be given will be difficult for us.
